Hackathon on rails!

Join us for a trainride of 2000km through the beautiful Swedish landscape together with 47 other hackers and work on making public transport better.

About Trainhack

The purpose of Trainhack is to create a unique challenging fun hackevent for developers where the journey focuses on creating of digital services that make travelling with public transport an easier and a more positive experience.
